name: Oozie Editor Plugin
tagline: Apache Oozie editor plugins for the famous IDEs
body: # Oozie Editor Plugin Apache Oozie editor plugins for the famous IDEs like Eclipse and IntelliJ IDEA. Currently, only Eclipse is supported. ## Oozie Eclipse Plugin ![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mashin-io/oep/gh-pages/imgs/screenshot01.png) ![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mashin-io/oep/gh-pages/imgs/screenshot03.png) Find the plugin on [Eclipse Marketplace](https://marketplace.eclipse.org/content/oozie-eclipse-plugin) Visit the plugin's [blog](http://blog.oep.mashin.io/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
